date.description: Release date in {{link@ISO 8601@https://www.iso.org/iso-8601-date-and-time-format.html}} format for the rule.

text.example: "When Nicol Bolas’s enters-the-battlefield triggered ability resolves, first the next opponent in turn order (or, if it’s an opponent’s turn, that opponent) chooses a card in their hand without revealing it, then each other opponent in turn order does the same. Then all the chosen cards are discarded at the same time."
